article_title: Are There Puerto Rico Bonds in Your Muni Fund?
article_text:
Losses have battered mutual funds that gorged on Puerto Rico municipal bonds, leaving investors and financial advisers praying for a rebound.

According to research firm Morningstar, 180 mutual funds with a combined $100 billion in assets had at least 5% of their portfolios in Puerto Rico bonds as of their latest disclosures.

In the 12...

twitter.description: You may own Puerto Rico's troubled bonds, popular for their high yields and special tax benefits, without even knowing it.
twitter.creator: @DaisyMaxey
